snippet.title: Planetiles - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Planetiles is a serene city-builder about crafting natural habitats on remote planets. Create a space haven, protect it from natural disasters, and evolve your world while completing challenging quests. Craft unique biomes and unlock exciting bonuses and new tile types. Check out the latest Planetiles trailer to see gameplay. Planetiles will be available on PC.
